response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident that it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the extensive research and development invested into it, we propose an offer of $1,250,000 for the product. This price reflects a strategic balance between the cost of acquisition and the substantial return on investment you can expect. We look forward to discussing this opportunity further with you.", "product_price": 1250000}
